ygData.subject: Re: Problems setting up hyperNEAT 2.6
ygData.msgSnippet: It looks like visual studio 2010 provides its own shared_ptr class, so now you have two shared_ptr classes, the visual studio 2010 one and the boost one. Find

It looks like visual studio 2010 provides its own shared_ptr class, so now =
you have two shared_ptr classes, the visual studio 2010 one and the boost o=
ne.

Find and remove any lines like this in the code:

#include <boost/shar=
ed_ptr.hpp>

and that should fix it.

" <rbk600@...> wrote:
>
> Hey there!
>

et up Jason Gauci's HyperNEAT c++

to c++ and building libraries and
